experience.title: AI/ML Intern
experience.description: Developed a deep learning model for agricultural forecasting, achieving 90% accuracy in crop yield predictions. Automated ML pipelines, reducing training time, and integrated models via RESTful APIs for real-time data processing.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Engineered predictive models for sales forecasting, improving accuracy. Conducted exploratory data analysis on large datasets, uncovering key trends to inform strategic business decisions.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors. Participated in various coding competitions and hackathons.

projects.title: MedSearch AI
projects.description: The Medical-RAG project is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system designed to extract and provide accurate, context-aware responses from a 600+ page medical book. It combines advanced document retrieval techniques with powerful language models to deliver real-time, insightful answers via an interactive web interface.

projects.title: Neural-Powered Content Intelligence Platform
projects.description: The project is an end-to-end system that identifies and classifies hateful content using advanced machine learning techniques. It features a modular pipeline for data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation, combined with an intuitive web interface for real-time text analysis, ensuring scalability.

projects.title: ML-Powered Quality Assurance System
projects.description: The system predicts wine quality using chemical properties through a modular ML pipeline. It integrates MLflow for experiment tracking and model deployment and includes a user-friendly web interface for interaction. The design ensures scalability, reproducibility, and efficient performance.

blogs.title: Automating Machine Learning Pipelines with Apache Airflow: A Beginner's Guide
blogs.summary: Learn to automate machine learning workflows using Apache Airflow in this beginner-friendly guide.

blogs.title: From Messy Text to Model-Ready Data: A Guide to NLP Preprocessing
blogs.summary: Guide to NLP preprocessing: cleaning, tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, and preparing text data for machine learning models.

blogs.title: ModernBERT in Simple Terms
blogs.summary: ModernBERT explained: Advanced NLP model for understanding context, improving language tasks, and enhancing AI communication.

about.title: Machine Learning Engineer
about.description: Passionate about leveraging AI and machine learning to solve real-world problems. With over 5 years of experience in the field, I've worked on various projects ranging from natural language processing to computer vision. I'm dedicated to staying at the forefront of AI advancements and sharing knowledge through technical writing and open-source contributions.
